question: 整理する
sourceAnswer: To Arrange, To Organize, To Sort
activeAnswer: To Arrange, To Organize, To Sort
sourceMnemonic: When you <kanji>arrange</kanji> something with <kanji>reason</kanji> you're arranging it. That's why this is <vocabulary>to arrange</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
